content: Mobile Plans Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Aug 2019Anyone trying out the latest MVNO VIVIFI?It seems like a good idea but there isn't much information regarding it other than it's pricing and focus on sharing data. Anyone got any experiences to share with me?1 answerAnswerBump2

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 22 Aug 2019Hey! You will find some reviews about them here when people start using them: https://seedly.sg/reviews/telco-mobile-plans/vivifiRight now out of all the reviews we got so far, none has been for Vivifi... must be having a tough time to get users for them.But personally I would either go for Circles, GOMO or GIGA!
